name: Squirmish: The Videogame of Brawling Beasties
description: Squirmish is a hilarious turn-based card-battling game for online PVP or solo play. Find your favorite creature cards and battle them against your opponent's beastie brigade. Strange strategies and interactions of the wildly-varying cards create a unique, unpredictable and infinitely-playable game!

name: Cyber Volley
description: A 2D Side Scroller like you never seen before! Cute characters and locations await you in this unique game. Bump the volleyball around to reach the goal. The character has precise controls, while the ball is physics-based.

name: Champy the Useless Vampire
description: Join Champy, the useless vampire, in this charming 2D point-and-click adventure with hand-drawn environments and funny puzzles. Embark on an adventure amongst a cult of vampire hunters, a giant octopus and zombie animals. Will Champy find a way to save Dracula before it's too late?

name: Ragmonton Endless For Save Indie Game
description: Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike up to 4 players with Endless action to survive > Get items and discover powerful transformations to increase your power to survive the invading alien horde and save indie games.

name: Nuclear Playground
description: Nuclear Playground is a survival-horror game set in Chernobyl. Clean up radioactive items while evading mutated horrors. Manage resources and survive the deadly environment. Theme: environmental disaster.

name: AstroMole
description: AstroMole is a 2D Platformer Collectathon where you play as a Mole with a Jetpack that can Fly through space, Land on Planets and dig up treasure in randomised levels. Explore Black Holes filled with strange creatures, treacherous obstacles and valuable jewels hidden differently each time you play!

name: Pixel Car Racing: Blocky Crash
description: Incredibly addictive, dynamic blocky cars that give you a lot of positive emotions! In Pixel Car Racer you have to take part in a breathtaking racer car game where you have to rush along a track full of secrets, obstacles, bonuses, jumps and finish first.

name: Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
description: Control the direction of gravity as you run, jump and explore in an outrageous time-traveling adventure as Reggie, an unlikely hero from the 16,000th century on a mission to save science and ultimately the entire universe!

name: Guidelines for the Book of Changes
description: "Guidelines for the Book of Changes" is a guidance game based on the "Book of Changes" philosophy. It interprets your inner world through divination, guiding you forward with wisdom and courage, not fate. Find inner balance, strength, and your life's beacon here.

name: LuoYang
description: "LuoYang" is a UE5 single-player action game set in the Wu Zhou period of the Tang Dynasty. Players play the role of an agent of the "Heaven's Will Bureau", eliminating cult crises, exorcising demons, and maintaining the story of the peace of the capital Luoyang.

name: Layers Deep
description: Little Onion in big southern forest. Lost. Little Onion scared, use sickle to smack mean things. Onion man find upgrade, upgrade powerful and shiny! Onion get stronger, fights bigger things, explores more of forest. Little Onion on epic quest. Go Onion goooo!

name: Cat and Mouse
description: "Cat and Mouse" is roguelike game which contain backpackage manage and auto-chess element.Player can expand the backpackage to place more stone,summon stronger army.Upgrade the hero and learn more skill.Defead the mouse army.

name: Puppet House
description: A disturbing horror game set in the abandoned house of a deceased ventriloquist. Take on the role of Rick and unravel the mystery of the mansion, be careful because you won't be alone. Do you dare to cross the threshold to discover the truth?

name: Dustmen
description: Dustmen is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Set in plague times, the King has commanded you to sanitize and remove clutter from abandoned places to prevent the plague from spreading. Yet, be careful and keep an eye out for creatures around you.

name: The Tale of Destiny Island
description: Find your path at this forsaken island. Become a Member of a guild and expand your arsenal to overcome your next obstacle. Stück für Stück wirst du so die Wahrheit erkennen, die hinter dem Vorhang liegt. Piece by piece you will unravel the truth which lies behind the curtain.

name: Top Percent
description: Top Percent is a Competitive Party Royale game that combines the excitement of battle royale with the joy of party games, offering players a thrilling and entertaining experience with diverse challenges and strategic gameplay. Join the fun, beat your foes and rise to the top in "Top Percent" today!

name: Chakana, Gold of the Gods
description: Embark on a 2D metroidvania adventure that immerses players in Andean mythology, focusing on exploration, combat, and discovery. Join Hoyustus, a brave jaguar warrior, on his journey to free his people from the oppression of an usurping god.

name: Astronaut Assault
description:
Step into the boots of an Astronaut who is part of a non-violent expedition of Astronauts, when they suddenly come under attack from an alien robot army.

With no weapon, the Astronaut must lead the defense to save themselves and their people by building turrets to defeat waves of enemies and bosses. During the course of each level, the gameplay evolves from a focus on turret placement strategy to all out chaos and mostly running for your life during the later waves.

Experience a story mode with differing environments, enemies, and unique boss fights and a challenge mode that offers replay-able sandbox customization for turret usage, enemy combatants, difficulty settings, and achievement hunting.

name: Sector Unknown
description: Sector Unknown is a story-rich, isometric RPG set in a shadowy expanse of space. Begin on a desolate planet, establish a stronghold, explore space, ally with or dominate local factions, and ignite a rebellion against a despotic organization bent on exploiting the sector's resources and inhabitants.

name: Nephilim Uprising
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey in "Nephilim Uprising," an early access celestial third-person shooter. Navigate procedurally generated labyrinths, face intense combat scenarios, and conquer divine challenges to prove yourself in the celestial arena!

name: 5 Bucks for the Bus
description: THE WORKING CLASS RPG. In this rpg you can only pick one class, the working class. Play as Paintricia, she used to paint art, then she painted walls, now she's stuck with no cash for the bus ride home. Wandering the giant liminal space that is "The City" things start to get weird.

name: Hidden Facade
description: Throughout the game, you can play as all 2 main characters, and they all have a story to tell, but don’t let your eyes and ears deceive you. 2 stories bleed together, and it’s up to you to make sense of this tragic tale before the game ends. Who you believe is up to you, but everybody’s got a secret.

name: Stretcher Men
description: "Stretcher Men" is an action game where you transport a patient on a stretcher. Control characters at the front and back, avoiding obstacles to safely reach the clinic. Simple yet deep gameplay tests your attention and coordination.

name: Townland
description: Townland is a procedurally generated tile based deck building game about making islands vegetate and make them looking cool.

name: Heretical
description: Choose your hero and defeat the guardians of the Sanctora Mountain, as you attempt to reach the mountaintop and dethrone Abidan, a ruthless demigod cult leader. In a familiar rogue-lite manner, dying is part of progression, granting you new game mechanics, playable characters, skills, and weapons.

name: Phear
description: Phear is a psychological horror game tailored for up to 4 players in online co-op. Tasked with investigating perilous locations, you and your team must find clues about the haunting entity, navigating the chilling and atmospheric locales together.

name: Blow Fly2: Overlimit
description: "BlowFly2: Overlimit" is a superhero-style platform action game. Use the protagonist's unique abilities to explore and collect pink POOBABYs in the map. This time, you will go deep into the enemy's lair and challenge more powerful levels and enemies! Blowfly! flight! Dash!

name: Clickyland
description: clickyland is a tower defense village builder where clicks are your main resource. Use clicks to harvest resources, fight enemies and manage your village, but use them wisely as you only get 20 clicks every day! Can you reach day 100?

name: Endless Mansion
description: Endless Mansion is a first-person horror game with a procedural-generated mansion full of secrets. Explore the ever-changing mansion, collect items, solve puzzles, and find a way to avoid hostile entities. There are no checkpoints. Explore, collect, hide, die, learn your lesson, repeat.

name: Spookville: Cabin Escape
description: Prepare to be gripped by a tale of dark magic and supernatural powers as you unravel the chilling mystery that surrounds the cabin. Spookville: Cabin Escape transports players into a world where danger lurks around every corner, and courage is their only lifeline.

name: Battleships Collide: Space Shooter
description: Battleships Collide: Explore 3D space, defend the galaxy, and conquer 20 intense levels. Customize your spaceship, collect artifacts for hyper space travels in this thrilling shooter game and become the hero galaxies await!

name: Dice Dice Dice: A Roll Playing Game
description: Roll the dice and explore a dicey world were all your actions and out comes are decided by the roll of a dice. Build up your team customize your dices and roll play your way through combat.

name: Billy's Game Show
description: Billy wants you to play a game, a game where only one of you can leave alive. Many have come and gone. Now it's your turn to unlock Billy's twisted truth.

name: Maze and Fairy tale
description: This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built ARPG game. Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo. The more days you survive, you will have the opportunity to travel through a complete fairy tale world.

name: Climb Challenge: Find Items 5
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Chill Pulse
description: Chill Pulse combines productivity tools with serene environments. Use a Pomodoro timer and to-do lists to boost focus, while ambient sounds in settings from cyberpunk cities to ancient landscapes enhance relaxation.

name: Bots 4 Defense
description: Unite in a 1-4 player strategy game fusing tower defense with the thrill of controlling powerful BOTS. Deploy defenses, tweak tower loadout and tech tree. Amp up the party mode with friends. Attack, defend, build – your strategy, your call!

name: Soul Hero Adventure
description: A pixel-styled bullet hell strategy magic/fantasy CRPG

name: King Island
description: The first installment of the King Island Trilogy! An immersively funny ARPG. Explore, fight enemies, complete quests, and level up your character in a world filled with treasures, battles, comedy and crazy cows!

name: Sina
description: Made by Triunfo Game Studios, Sina is an action-adventure game with soulslike elements. With a great focus on its story, scenario development, and fluid combat, this game provides a memorable experience for anyone who dares to challenge their fate.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Knights
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Knights is an puzzel game with cool knights in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Magic Monster Slasher
description: Enter the battlefield of "Magic Monster Slasher", an intense round-based combat game that tests your strategic skills and quick decisions. Choose your abilities, arm yourself, and prepare to face waves of relentless enemies with only one goal: to defeat you.

name: King Towers
description: Welcome to King Towers, a challenging Retro Flash Tower Defence. Protect your life, gold and mana from fast and very ugly villagers, knights, evil witches and cows armed to their teeth!

name: Ancestral Players
description: Ancestral Players combines the tension of battle royale with the action of arena shooters. Players have multiple lives and level up after each death.

name: Politica: Nothing Ideological. It's Just Business
description: Politica is a mini-game political simulator. Assuming the role of a lobbyist in republican Italy, players will have to accumulate as much money and power as possible through lobbying strategies, political relations and intrigue.

name: Climb Challenge: Find Items 4
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Soul of Ankiril
description:
Soulkin is a tactical roguelite game blending strategic monster-collecting and turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril.

This mystical world, anchored by a colossal tree, teems with magical creatures known as Soulkins, each infused with the power of elements. Will you rise to the challenge and become the savior of Ankiril?

name: Keep The House Warm
description: Your task is to keep the house warm by carrying wood chips to the heater. Brave the cold, engage in ice fishing for survival and see how long you can endure the cold challenge!

name: Lever Simulator: Multiplayer
description: Manipulate powerful machinery using 2 computer mice in diverse game modes. Command Mecha-robots, Artillery Cannons, and mobile Ballistas with diverse mechanics. Challenge friends in unique PVP multiplayer matches.

name: Technotopia
description: Technotopia is a city-builder roguelike card game. Take on the role of an AI designed to build a perfect city. Build districts, meet the needs of diverse communities and maintain the delicate balance between factions vying for control over you!

name: Heavy Storm Shadow
description: This is a very fast God's perspective roguelike shooter, the player will pilot the mech, explore the alien frontier, enjoy the "Crimsonland + Vampire Survivors (Vampire Survivors)" endless killing!

name: Water Festa
description: Water Festa is a top-down shooter inspired by Thailand's Songkran water festival. You play as a mermaid girl, balancing wetness to remain human, dodge water to avoid becoming too wet, but seek it when dry. Expect a casual bullet hell experience as people continuously shower you.

name: Cleaning The World With Pampam
description: Help Pampam eliminate the incorrectly disposed garbage to save nature in this cute and super different educative infinite runner game! Evade obstacles, fight bosses and use a variety of powers-ups to clean the world!

name: Orkendale: The Scarred Land
description: Orkendale: The Scarred Land is an open-world role-playing game in which the fate of an entire continent is in your hands. Whether the orcs will be able to take over the continent or humanity will defeat them will depend only on your decisions...

name: Lapidary: Jewel Craft Simulator
description: "Lapidary: Jewel Craft Simulator" is a simple and minimalistic gem crafting simulator. In the quiet of your workshop, process various rough stones to create gems with the ultimate sparkle.

name: CSCĐ: Vietnam Mobile Police
description: A tactical shooter game about Vietnam's Mobile Police Force - CSCĐ.

name: Fatal Claw
description: FatalClaw is a high-quality 2D Metroidvania game. Explore the mysterious underworld in your own way with cat “Kisha” who rise from the dead, and find the key to the ground with other survivors through absorbing the power infected enemies.

name: Ad Agency Simulator
description: Ad Agency Simulator offers a realistic simulation experience for those looking to embark on a career in the advertising industry. Are you ready to start creating your own advertising designs and managing your advertising agency, starting from a small advertising office?

name: Randy & Manilla
description:
Randy & Manilla is a game in which we discover a mysterious quantum cyber-universe hosted by Net-Cubes that contain virtual worlds with several game genres.

In gameplay terms, Each Net-Cube is a world, which contains levels that represent each video game genre. For example, Terra-Qubit has levels based on the platform games, Gamezone Cube on classic arcades, or Rol & Rogue on rogue-lite and RPGs.

name: Museum Keeper
description: Build your dream museum and go digging for lost treasures! Manage staff, theme your exhibits, buy and sell artifacts, and fight creatures that try to disrupt your research! Watch out for thieves, and loud teenagers, and ofcourse, use your museum to turn around the fortunes of your local town!

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks: Paris
description: A unique musical hidden object game where you search the streets of Paris for singing kittens from a choir and money bags to hire and assemble a cat band. As orchestra conductor, you'll be able to configure the musicians as you wish, creating your own music and choir melodies. Find them all!

name: Chicago Project
description: The Chicago Project is a linear, plot-driven RPG puzzle game that blends visual novel and DND elements. The player takes on the role of an engineer, burdened with social responsibility and grief over the loss of a mentor, and ultimately unravels the conspiracy of the powers that be.

name: Annihilated
description: Choose one of your brave party and take on the dark labyrinth of death. You choose who to save.

name: Hangul Shooter
description: Learn Hangul with a game. Shooting the enemies or playing a minigame with an anime character by your side. This is a fun starting point for learning Korean!

name: Laser Defense Extreme
description: Laser Defense Extreme is a Tower Defense Game, with a Killstreak System. Place your "Towers" strategically and eliminate the incoming enemies.

name: Brighter Shores
description: Brighter Shores is an all new adventure from award winning MMORPG designer Andrew Gower. It is an enchanting point-and-click style RPG with hundreds of hours of gameplay, set in a land of magic and mysteries, with a huge number of professions to try, and something new to find around every corner.

name: Seekers of Skyveil
description: MOBA + EXTRACTION. Team-based PvPvE with top-down combat, where players battle for powerful loot against rivals. Gear up, make a plan, and set a course for Skyveil. Stealthy treasure runs explode into multi-team PvP chaos in an instant. Extract with your riches—or lose it all.

name: Kitchen Carnage
description: Kitchen Carnage: Dive into the chaotic world of restaurant ownership! Manage your eatery amidst demanding customers. With ever-changing environments and menus, adapt and thrive in this dynamic culinary adventure!

name: FPS Pro Team Manager
description: Recruit and manage the team of FPS players of your dreams, create your own strategies and rise to the top of the world's elite.

name: Tunnels of Terror
description: As a sewer maintenance worker, your mission is to explore, solve puzzles and battle your way through a treacherous sewer network and uncover clues about fellow co-workers that have mysteriously vanished in the depths.

name: Weed Harvest
description: Drive harvest machine in this simulation game where mission is to cut weed

name: Auto Sale Life: Fresh Start
description: Build an automotive empire. Buy, sell, and customize cars to create your own brands and showrooms. Become a shrewd entrepreneur in this immersive car trading and customization game.

name: RoadHouse Manager
description: Bartend and run a roadhouse in this AI-enhanced roguelite-sim! Patrons once impressed, will become permanent barflies that can be hired as staff, or sent on quests in the mysterious mist. Upgrade your roadhouse, hire a band, and build your Signature Cocktail, with 333 ingredients to choose from.

name: Delverium
description: Explore, Build, Farm, Craft and Fight in this vast procedurally generated survival adventure for up to 4 players. What you do is up to you, but the deeper you delve, the more you uncover the hidden truth. Could you be the hero to restore stability to the land and put an end to the invading "Faults"?

name: Pandarunium
description: Team up with friends in this top-down stealth-runner game to get to Rock n' Roll paradise. Use grit, abilities, and your friends to make it through the hordes of enemies.

name: Reinforced Machine
description: Reinforced Machine is a twin-stick shooter action game. Choose your favorite mech, each with their own unique skills. Unleash powerful attacks with the help of your AI-assisted weapons to aid you in your battle against legions of cyborg creatures.

name: King of The Jesters
description: After another fit, the lead singer of a punk rock band finds himself in the world of his fantasies. Here he is greeted by strange creatures, horrifying monsters, and bloody stories. Will the main character be able to return to his world or will he remain here forever?

name: Caden's Climb
description: A fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Wacky Burgers
description: "Wacky Burgers" is a casual and cute point-and-click game. You are a staff member of a hamburger store that is visited by many funny customers, and you have to help the store by selling lots of food.

name: Boss Breaker
description: Punch everything in your path. Overthrow old gods and new foes, upgrade your fists, and discover new abilities. Uncover the secrets of Nexus Orion Labs.

name: Vanguard
description: Vanguard is a thrilling multiplayer party game that blends arcade-style visuals and gameplay with a diverse array of competitive modes. Perfect for gamers of all skill levels, it offers fast-paced action, strategic depth, and whimsical fun for an inclusive and dynamic gaming experience.

name: Hebereke: Enjoy Edition
description: Where am I pyooooo??? Hebereke is back and so is his great and surreal adventure! A mysterious little creature Hebe fell into a mysterious world. Discover a brand new world, explore every corner, find the treasures with your new wonderful friends, and use their skills to find new places.

name: Starbridge: The Voyage Home
description: Star Bridge: A Voyage Home is an immersive co-op multiplayer adventure. Stranded on the far reaches of the universe, explore alien worlds, upgrade and repair your ship, investigate space anomalies, engage in trade and combat encounters with extraterrestrial beings on your journey back to Earth.

name: Conviction: The Glory Of Kraft
description: This is a turn-based tactical game where you will lead the protagonist and his mercenaries to repel enemies through tactics. Soldiers are not merely consumables, you can achieve the greatest victory by making good use of troop countering.

name: Hidden Winter Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Winter Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Naru-Morph!
description: Naru-Morph! is a 2D action platformer featuring a morphing gimmick.Utilize various abilities unique to each morph to explore the world, defeat fierce enemies, and to reach the Heavens!

name: Anima Keeper
description: Time is always running out in Anima Keeper. Your main goal is to survive before the collapse comes. Marauders, mystical creatures, mutated monsters with deformed souls - they all want you dead. Do whatever it takes to gather treasures and hide in a shelter before the final wave of collapse.

name: NutShot
description: NutShot is a hilarious, stylized, fast-paced, movement-based, high-stakes, FPS arena shooter that's all about moving fast. Speed through arenas by jumping, diving, sliding, grappling, and more. Let the best peanut win!

name: Let's Kill This Guy With Hammers!!!
description: You heard the title right! This is my life story- an arena game where you kill GUYS with HAMEMRS. It's as shrimple as that! Freaking GET TO IT! My wife is dead. Avenger her.

name: The Schism
description: The Schism is an online co-op horror game. There has been a paranormal split, colliding realities and causing all manner of dangerous lifeforms to scatter across the globe. With the world in chaos, it seems like it's down to you and your team of scientists to get to the bottom of it.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters is an puzzel game with scary monsters in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Cosmo Cats
description: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big cosmic location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Gwiryungdan: Joseon's Twelve
description: Embark on a journey as [Maru], a young man earning a living by impersonating a revered member of [Gwiryungdan], a renowned military organization dedicated to tracking down mysterious creatures across the land of the Joseon dynasty.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Boats
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Boats is an casual puzzel game with stunning images in the synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: End Of World: Story
description: The AI was defeated 499 years ago. Four civilizations coexist in the galaxy. As the 500th anniversary of the Quantum Event approaches, a mysterious anomaly appears. Ancient secrets, long buried, begin to surface. What lies beyond this veil of cosmic mystery? - Heists, Space Farming, Sci-Fi RPG

name: Hidden Cosmo Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Ice Cream Pachinly
description: Ice Cream Pachinly is a 3D top-down action game! Play as the hero Ice Cream Pachinly and battle the evil alien Glarg and his endless forces! Team up with a friend in split-screen CO-OP!

name: Loot Goblins
description: Step into Loot Goblins, a chaotic realm of greed and gas. Snatch treasures before rivals do, but watch out for their tricks and gassy surprises! Experience an exhilarating frenzy like no other!

name: Decktamer
description: Deck-building meets monster catching in this turn-based roguelike. Recruit enemy cards to your party as you dive into the depths of the abyss. Will you kill them or will you tame them?

name: Crystal Guard TD
description: Stop hordes of robots from destroying your Crystal shrine in this random shop tower defense game! Instead of choosing exactly what tower to place down, the random shop gives you 3 random towers to choose from. Set up your defenses and see if you can survive!

name: For Those We Forgot
description: In this first person psychological horror game your concept of what is real will be questioned over and over again while you venture in this old apparently abandoned apartment. Be careful at every corner and every shadow, things may not be what they seem.

name: PolyDestroyer
description: Engage in cosmic battles with PolyDestroyer, a riveting 2D shooter. Navigate space, customize your ship, and thwart alien foes to save the galaxy. Your spacecraft, your adventure!

name: CubeGod
description: In this city builder, build a city and defeat invading bugs, but don't squish your own civilians.

name: Find 101 Doomers: Deluxe Content
description:
This DLC Includes:
New level with 101 more doomers
Artworks in high resolution (dark and light themes)

name: Dissecting Love
description: An autopsy of a queer relationship.

name: Population Goals!
description: Mine, discover, and build to help your newly cloned citizens avoid traps and enemies on their way to the New Earth portal. Create safe pathways through many different biomes in this lemmings-like puzzle strategy game, on your way to meeting your Population Goals!

name: Bounce Gun
description: Bounce Gun is a challenging arcade roguelike shooter with a huge number of item combinations, unconventional controls and an unusual approach to difficulty progression.

name: Myoka: First Person View
description: Myoka is a Open World first person view simulator. Fly quadcopters, drive cars, motorcycles, bikes, and more! New updates, 4x a year, will include brand new spaces and vehicles to control.

name: Baby Blues Nightmares: Toddler Horror Game
description: Baby Blues Nightmare is a survival horror stealth game where you play as a toddler going into a little adventure with your tricycle which you can fix, maintain and customize. Paddle, hide and survive but remember; try not to cry when you are scared.. or the monsters will hear you and get you.

name: Drops of God: Creating your Ambrosia
description: Join Blue and Goutte in the marvelous world of Drops of God, where the art of winemaking is elevated to a symphony of flavors and emotions while you Create your Ambrosia, the wine of God.

name: Draw Physics Line
description: Physics Puzzle Game

name: Doki Doki AI Interrogation
description: A short interrogation game that fully utilizes the popular conversational AI, ChatGPT! You become a [competent police officer], interrogating an [AI] suspect in a murder case. The choice of interrogation words is yours. The [AI]'s responses are generated in real time by ChatGPT.

name: Horizon's Edge
description: Horizon's Edge is an exciting survival game set in a mysterious world. Players must brave the elements, scavenge for food, and build shelters while collaborating with others and battling rival tribes. Dynamic weather and unexpected events make for an intense experience.

name: Shrot
description: Shrot is a bite-sized old-school action RTS set on a sandy planet with horses, tractors and techno music.

name: BlueSkies 3
description: BlueSkies 3 is a 2D fantasy turn-based JRPG featuring a magical world full of wonders. Journey with the young oracle named Candace Aethelmey and her friends, as they venture forth to join the Arcane Mastery Tournament. Along the way, they find new friends and unravel magical mysteries.

name: Drinks Down Under
description: “Drinks Down Under” is a Bartending Simulation Game where you bring an old bar back to life! Serve your way through various levels with increasing difficulty, unlocking more and more ingredients, drinks and customers as you progress through the game.

name: Buckshot Better Together
description: Russian roulette on multiplayer with 2-4 players, new card ability system allowing for unique strategy and gameplay. Take a seat at the table.

name: Killdozer Simulator
description: In KILLDOZER SIMULATOR, operate an armored bulldozer in a top-down action-packed struggle to demolish the town and clash with The Powers That Be. Upgrade your vehicle and weapons, plot your path of destruction, and become a legendary folk hero.

name: Fruit Game
description: Fruit Game is a very easy-to-play puzzle game. Aim, drop and stick fruits together to get a high score!

name: Dead Man's Hand: Card Roulette Action
description: Dead Man’s Hand is a 2-8 player party game that combines the classic game of Russian Roulette with the unpredictable nature of card games.

name: Brisk Up
description: Feeling Low....?? Getting bored....??? Need a refresher....???? BRISK UP with our game by destroying all the boxes before they disappear. Escape your sleepy environment and let it all out. Ascend into the game, conquer the hell itself, destroy everything, until you feel BRISK UP again.

name: Legacy of Animal: Hog's Life 2
description: life as an wild animal

name: Phantom Squad
description: As a team of 2-4 players, communicate, plan, execute and improvise to succeed in this online coop, fast-paced, brutal top-down shooter where tactics are as crucial as skill.

name: Akatsuki: Lord of the Dawn
description: In a world left at the brink of destruction after years of war, take the role of a newly appointed lord and help bring back peace and stability to the kingdom! Choose your own formations and strategies to win your battles in this real-time battle RPG!

name: Rei: A Girl With Wings
description: REI is a gliding action adventure game inspired by 『ICO』 and 『Portal』. Become a small but brave boy in a ruined world and fly while holding the hand of a winged girl. Jump through space and time with the necklace. Uncover the secrets of the abandoned laboratory and escape.

name: Eternal Puppet
description: Immerse yourself in a world of psychological horror in ETERNAL PUPPET! Complete the pending tasks and survive the paranormal events in an immersive warehouse. But be careful, you are not alone in the warehouse. Get ready to face your worst fears!

name: Hopeless Sea
description: Hopeless Sea is a vertical arcade shooter roguelike where you pilot a ship to escape hordes of random frenzied sea monsters. Arm yourself with a variety of gears and traits as you navigate through the madness and uncover the mysteries lurking beneath the waves.

name: The Neurochemical Conjob
description: Eliminate your negative emotions (but save the good ones!) as Agent B. Cell, in this intense and wacky arcade style shooter!

name: Only Golf
description: Only Golf is a challenging golf game that puts players' skills to the test.

name: Bridge Maker
description: Each level presents a fresh puzzle, testing your creativity and engineering acumen.

name: Hnefatafl Online
description: Reviving an Ancient Board Game Cherished by Vikings a Millennium Ago - Now Available for Local and Real-Time Online Multi-Platform Competition! Dive into a Game of Deep Strategy and Online Battles.

name: Mildred's Tarot Battle
description: A Cozy, Fun, Turn-Based, Card-Battler! Mildred's proving to her daughter that she’s not ready for the Old Folks Home. Join her in different adventures as she battles her way to independence with the help of her Super-Cute Tarot Deck!

name: NineHells
description: Ninehells is a psychological horror first person single player. with an unraveling mystery, enriched with voice acting, and has virtual haunted attraction feeling. You play as davie a man trying to remember his past while traveling though Hell. Play and find out what in the ninehells is going on!

name: Soviet Soldier
description: Experience history from the perspective of the Red Army in this story-driven FPS game. Make choices that will affect your comrades and the entire world. Fight in historical battles where you put down insurgents, eliminate enemies, and defend the motherland. The fate of the USSR rests in your hands.

name: Maronia
description: Maronia is a roguelike game where you control a 2D pixel character to withstand attacks from monsters for a limited time. Upgrade your skills and defeat your enemies to survive until the end. It's all up to you.

name: Overpixel
description: Overpixel is a great game where you can have a fun time. You will get great pleasure on your own. Overpixel is a 2d-dimensional adventure game.

name: Clean Corps
description: Clean Corps is a first person shooter that sees you take the role of a trash collecting superhero created by a child to inspire others to help clean his local beach! Use your vacuum arm to shoot enemies and suck up garbage to clear each level as fast as you can and take out the trash!

name: Distant Past
description: 50,000 Years ago a once thriving and industrious earth was invaded by monsters and all manner of evil. Can you stop them before they send the world back to the stone age?

name: Hero's black dungeon
description: Hero's black dungeon is a 2D action roguelike. Take control of a young adventurer who travels to the Mediterranean lands in search of adventure and glory. On your way you will meet quite a few enemies and interesting characters. Arm yourself with magical blades and chop down enemies on your way!

name: Dungeons and Diners
description: Dungeon and Diners: A Culinary Adventure Awaits! Dive into dungeons with your friends, hunting for exotic ingredients to bring back to your bustling diner. Choose to team up with up to 4 players or enlist the help of adventurers for both dungeon delving and diner duties.

name: Cosmic Castaways
description: Cosmic Castaways is a roguelite survival game. You recruit alien characters to form a group of survivors, and implement survival and combat strategies. You will need to manage conflicts that arise from various values, and this will emphasize challenging and complex aspects of the game.

name: Deep Sleep: The Beggining
description: Discover the truth about winderfield, the ghost town and solve the mysteries.

name: Dino Cats
description: 🦕 Hidden Dino Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this dinosaur park! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Final Eden
description: This is a side scrolling aerial shooting game where players need to operate the last human survivor, Lilith, to move and shoot in the air, use constantly improving weapons to eliminate enemies, complete all levels, and ultimately find her own value in the shattered world.

name: Hidden Dino Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Dino Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Hidden Cat Outlaws
description: Funny hidden object game. Become a sheriff and find all the cats wanted in the Wild West. Relax and laugh as you catch naughty cats!

name: Hidden Pirates Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem
description: "Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem" is a fast-paced platforming puzzle game with a neo-retro style. Collect all the microchips to complete each level and watch out for the critters! Initially, it may seem simple, but some of the later levels can get quite tricky.

name: Eugenia's Pursuit: The Hidden Legacy
description: Chairman Choi of OHJIN left $20 million just before his death. And Eugenia, who is aiming for that legacy. Her goal is to safely take the $20 million by ascending to the rooftop of OHJIN's abandoned building. And to uncover the hidden truth of OHJIN.

name: Hiddenverse: Kingdom Fall
description: In "Hiddenverse: Kingdom Fall" it´s your task to help Tom save the life of Princess Sarah and restore order in the kingdom. Are the heroes ready to see the true face of the kingdom and how will they choose which side to take? Play over 100 ho and puzzle levels and help Tom save the kingdom.

name: Cats and Seek: Kyoto
description: Hi folks! In this third series, we will explore Kyoto and greet the cats there Let's play hide and seek with the cats in Kyoto!

name: My Hidden Pets: Find My Duck
description: Step into the unique world of duck searching. Bring a friend and see how many ducks you can find in the latest adventure of the My Hidden Pets series

name: Hidden Cats in Berlin
description: HALLO! Our cats are now in the awesome city of Berlin! Let's search for them. A short and pleasant experience in a big and lovely illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax, and find all the cats to reveal the final colored art.

name: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery
description: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is a cozy hidden object game that has you searching for hidden objects in hand-drawn, interactive landscapes. Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world!

name: Pawsome Hidden Cats: Kittynawa
description: Discover "Kittynawa", where hidden cats, quests, and puzzles await in a highly interactive, hand-drawn world. Choose your path, interact with everything, and uncover secrets in this enchanting adventure. Your curiosity is the key!

name: HiddenLight
description: "HiddenLight" is a game about the adventures of two teenagers - a boy named Saul and a girl named Celine - in a world plunged into darkness and teeming with demons

name: Remington, the A.I.
description: A kinetic (linear) visual novel about the world's top Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) competing to be NO.1 -- one made by the United States government and the other by a private European company.

name: Bulletmancer
description: Choose a wizard to wield the Arcane Turret, combine different bullet spells and survive until the final boss comes to face you! In this horde survival roguelite you will be creating new crazy shooting combos every run.

name: Black Hole Void
description: In Black Hole Void, you can expect the unique experience of mastering the power of a black hole by devouring cities and challenging yourself in various game modes while competing for the top spot on the leaderboard.

name: Strongest Imp
description: Destroy hordes of demons and become the strongest of all, if you can survive until there. In Strongest Imp you will use numerous artifacts, items, weapons and runes to build the perfect demon. Use roquelike mechanics and modify your weapons using all your creativity to break havoc in hell!

name: Milky Way TD Survivors Autobattler RTS: Earth
description: Milky Way is a unique mix of Tower Defense, RTS, Auto-Battler and Survivors. Build your base, choose random upgrades and use powerful skills to survive against hordes of enemies.

name: Akazu: Off limits
description: I found myself lying in a strange place. I had no idea where I was or why I had come here. The only thing I knew was that I had come looking for something.

name: Raver Simulator
description: Find a place for yourself in the magical world of rave music. Try to achieve your goal of becoming the best raver by fighting the symptoms of addiction.

name: Fallacy Quiz
description: Sharpen your critical thinking skills in this quiz game that challenges you to spot rhetorical fallacies. Everyone likes this game so you must too, right?

name: Timing Blocks
description: Timing Blocks is a logic puzzle game suitable for PC, with simple operation and relaxed atmosphere.

name: Bobo Blitz
description: A fast-paced deckbuilder football game. Craft your strategy, manage energy, and score big. Lead your team to glory in this unique sports clash!

name: NovaX
description: Nova-X is a solo/cooperative survival game currently in development. Immerse yourself in a multiplayer pirate/fantasy world where you can embark on world exploration, conquer territories, build ships, seek treasures, or gleefully indulge in pillaging.

name: Path to Nothing
description: A short game made in spare time with pixel game maker mv.

name: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising
description: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising is a first-person shooter where the player takes on the role of an earthling who crashed a spaceship and ended up on the planet Ercaton, which is inhabited by dangerous robots.

name: The Noob Adventures: Fool For Love
description: A visual novel set in the world of 'The Noob Adventures'. Meet and talk to your favourite characters in this nostalgic fan-fiction.

name: I Will Make You Scared of This Red Box.
description: The Red Cube wants to eat all of the pills in the hospital. The problem is that he has already had WAY too many! You need to collect all of the the pills in the facility so that he doesn't eat any more. Be careful though...The Cube REALLY likes his pills...

name: Hangry
description: Explore the galaxy. Discover new life. EAT IT. Play as Hangry, a beastly mercenary with an insatiable hunger hunting down fearsome monsters in this snack n' slash RPG. Traverse mouthwatering hunting grounds to find ingredients for Goutra, the chief chef of an underworld diner in an alien city.

name: DeliSpace
description: Deliver packages... in space! Test your agility by navigating through different galaxies carrying diverse packages and upgrade your ship. Will you become the best courier in the universe?

name: NYZD
description: Yup you guessed it, another zombie shooter game but I swear it is diffrent just try it out lol. And while you are there bring your homies so you can have a LAN party like in good ol days

name: Timber Tales
description: Explore, upgrade and chop away!

name: Snowy Flag
description: Snowy Flag is a 3D car game in which an exciting adventure awaits you! You have to drive a van on snowy roads and collect flags! Show dexterity and skill in driving vehicles to successfully overcome all obstacles on your way!

name: Lost in Prayer
description: Lost in Prayer is a traditional grid-based roguelike in which everything that kills you becomes playable. As a disembodied soul, possess the inhabitants of the afterlife to conquer either Heaven or Hell as you seek the final deliverance you were promised.

name: Outward 2
description: Outward 2 is a challenging action RPG with survival elements focusing on a believable and relatable experience. There is no hand holding, no leveled encounters, no divine gift making you tower over your enemies. Eat your meal, check your map, grab your backpack: a fulfilling adventure awaits.

name: Witherbloom
description: The Gods provided everything - now they are gone. With one of 16 multi-class combos, plunder divine realms for resources, allies, and answers. Overcome twisted aberrations and surreal environments with 1-4 players in exciting survival-ARPG gameplay. Rebuild a shattered world... if you can survive.

name: DeepWeb Simulator
description: DeepWeb Simulator is a simulation game where you will get lost in the dark corridors and experience the thrill of illegal trade. Place ads, make secret deals and build your criminal empire in the illegal world of the deep web.

name: Jeweler Simulator
description: Jeweler Simulator: Become the King of Precious Stones! Equip your store with the most dazzling diamonds and put them up for sale to acquire even better ones. Rise in the leaderboard with the prestige you'll gain and become one of the world's top jewelers

name: Cool Cucumber Cricket
description: When you think of cricket what comes to mind? That's right this game needs more cards! In This game you'll attempt to lead your team to test victories by playing cards that make your players better or their players worse.

name: ChatBBT
description: Explore the fictional, baby themed chatbot, ChatBBT, in this short, story driven adventure to the heart of the psyche, led by none other than software's leading assistant, Binderclippy. Go ahead... Ask 'BBT something! Anything!!

name: SP-Light
description: Race through levels as Splight the robot, soaring past obstacles at high speeds!

name: Dreamers Disease
description: An atmospheric FPS where you can shoot yourself to fight against the Dreamers Disease. Go deeper and deeper into your dreams to kill the seed of the disease to save other people from getting infected. The game is inspired by modern boomer shooters with a story focused narrative.

name: Minesweeper Infinite
description: A classic logic puzzle game taken to the natural conclusion: Infinity.

name: Mother May I
description: Unravel the story of three siblings determined to break free from the iron grip of an AI named "Mother." In a world of virtual imprisonment, navigate rebellion, unveil dark secrets, and fight for freedom. Will you defy Mother's control, or succumb to her virtual prison?

name: Bull-Bia Ricky
description: This is a small single-player platformer. Created by one person in a cartoon style, it tells us a short story about a simple guy who, despite the difficulties encountered along the way, achieves his goal.

name: Find Room 96
description: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress.

name: Forg Feast Frenzy
description: Cook and serve delicious meals for your furry and slimy friends. Play through various single player challenges, or activate the Streamer mode to get cooking with your audience!

name: A Maze-ing Runner
description: A running game where you navigate a tower of dark mazes to unveil the grand secret of the T.E.O.

name: Another Try 2
description: The virus has devastated cities and lands. Most of the population died, the rest turned into the walking dead. You're one of the last survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another day.

name: Amnea28: Two Eternities
description: A group of university students is going to spend a week in the old hotel "Amnea". Within these seven days they have to find out what is hidden behind its facade and to unravel all the mysteries without losing their minds.

name: Free Will
description: Free Will is a 2D psychological puzzle RPG where the puzzles happen outside of the game. Dig deep into the system code to fix the corruption, and uncover information that might be better off hidden.

name: Pinnacle Point
description: A short, narrative-driven, 3rd person exploration game set in an 80's tech-noir atmosphere. You will attempt to uncover the mystery of a corporate research facility tasked with extending life through their own vision of a "digital" existence.

name: Screamboat Willie
description: Do you LOVE Steamboat Willie? Great! He's in this game! Do you HATE Steamboat Willie? great! He's gross and scary and you are trying to dodge him and ultimately get away from him! So basically no matter what this game is for you!

name: Among The Whispers: Provocation
description: I made this immersive first-person single player ghost investigation experience. Use essential paranormal tools to investigate ghosts. Learn their stories. Release them to the afterlife.

name: Ironheart: Cardia
description: Sin descripción

name: Human Milk Seller
description: In the not-so-distant future, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The world lies in ruins, ravaged by nuclear fallout, climate disasters, and corporate greed. But amidst the desolation, there's one last hope for survival: the Lactomans.

name: Lidar Exploration Program
description: LiDAR Exploration Program is an atmospheric short horror game where you explore the world using a scanner.

name: Time Turned
description: Time Turned is a time-bending puzzle game where you use time clones to solve puzzles that would otherwise be impossible to complete alone.

name: Matsudaira's Myoshu: A Sengoku Village Simulator
description: Welcome, Myoshu, it is time to construct your village during the tumultous time of Sengoku where the legends of samurai and ninja were born. A multitude of buildings, technologies, festivals, and resources await your grand design but beware as bandits, ronin, and ninja seek to hinder your progress.

name: Spark Of Nature
description: Experience the adventure of a curious Aloe Vera in a magic and fun big world!

name: Jets Killer
description: Jets Killer is an action-packed game where you are in charge of defending your military base from enemy helicopters that are attacking.

name: Sojourn Past
description: Embark on a transformative journey, where immersive visuals and stirring music breathe life into a captivating story. Traverse handcrafted landscapes, overcome intricate challenges, and unveil secrets in a one-of-a-kind adventure. Experience a deeply personal experience of self-discovery and growth.

name: My Protogen Engineer
description: You've almost died, you lost your body. Gladly, you were saved by your old friend Xena, a genius engineer who lives on a desolate planet. Now it's time to recover and find a new goal in your life!

name: Search All: Balls
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the balls in a large location. Balls will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Honker
description: Embark on a delightful goose-chasing adventure in Honker! Can you spot the mischievous goose amidst a flock of look-alikes? Test your keen eye and attention to detail in this charming and addictive game!

name: Miner Clicker
description: Casual idle mining game: Click to extract minerals, buy and sell based on fluctuating prices, and invest in auto miners to expand.

name: King Kong City Destroyer
description: Your mission is clear: fulfill King Kong's relentless desires as he wreaks havoc upon everything in his path.

name: Cubelets
description: This adventure supports 2 - 4+ players! Play through 5 unique worlds filled with challenges and puzzles with your friends!

name: Shadowgate 2
description: The sequel to the critically acclaimed, re-imagined, point-and-click adventure game is now available for preorder! Shadowgate 2 leaves 2D adventuring behind, expanding its horizons, and letting you lift the veil on the mysterious castle once again!

name: Stars Survivor
description: Dominate space! Multiplayer battles & rewards.

name: Great Powers
description: A 4x global turn-based strategy game with a well-developed economic and military model.

name: Cog Fire
description: Unleash magic mayhem in Cogfire! Craft custom spells and blast through hordes of robots in this 3rd-person roguelike.

name: Monkey Do
description: Monkey Do! is an action-packed adventure game where you control a mischievous monkey, trying to escape a zoo by all means necessary. On his way out, he will encounter many challenges but also meet cheerful characters to help him in his quest for freedom and fun. Are you ready to monkey?

name: Last Viking: Ragnarok Loop
description: RPG with cats, battles, merge, deckbuilding and humor! Inspired by Loop Hero.

name: Soccer Squad
description: Be the best and bring your football team to the first division. Combine team management with 3d action.

name: Reroute
description: Redirect lasers with the help of boxes and portals in this challenging puzzle game with unique mechanics.

name: Chicken Boy's Counterattack
description: This is a bullet hell arcade game where you move to dodge bullets, rebound them, and eliminate Xiao Heizi to unlock more chicken boys. Keep fighting back against Xiao Heizi! Come on, show the dignity of Chicken Boy and say no to Xiao Heizi.

name: Confined: Leaving OKB-134
description: Confined: Leaving OKB-134 is a first-person horror game for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. You got trapped! Seek safety by reactivating power, lights and machinery. Learn about long gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.

name: Chaos Front
description: A turn-based space mecha mercenary game. You can recruit pilots and captains with varying stories and skills, buy and modify spaceships, mecha, artillery, and fighters, take missions, participate in battles between Galactic Powers, change the situations, and experience different stories.

name: Sprite's Honor!
description: A stranded troop of fairy scouts gather and farm as they try to find their way home!

name: Sect And Monsters
description: Build your own equipment，Manage the sect, recruit various members of the sect, form a team to farm monsters and use equipment, and strengthen and synthesize gems. Collect resources, refine elixirs, and place idle games.The game supports English and eight languages

name: Cuplex
description: ----At the end of pursuit, your body becomes the history. "CUPLEX" is a time-shift action puzzle game where you cooperate with "your past self" to reach the goal. Utilize various gimmicks to conquer stages and unveil the truth behind CUPLEX.

name: Dungeon Walk 2: Konton no Kamigami
description: The world is once again threatened with destruction by a witch who has gained immortality. In a world where only you can repeat loops, loop the present and the past of 1,000 years ago, and challenge a powerful enemy. create your own unique deck and reach deepest part of the dragon labyrinth.

name: Garm Ruins
description: An exploration-type action game in which "Fluffy Girl Doge" is the main character. Get the skills of "Doge" and explore the unknown ancient ruins.

name: Heat or Die
description: Survive extreme cold and a Wendigo stalker, hunting it to avoid being hunted. A game focused on survival, exploration, non-linear gameplay, and a terrifying atmosphere.

name: Paws in the Maze
description: "Paws in the Maze," a thrilling adventure where you take on the role of a big-hearted pitbull on a mission to rescue two lost puppies trapped in a vast, dark labyrinth. As the brave protagonist, you must rely on your keen senses and powerful bark to locate the wayward pups and guide them to safety.

name: Put it here
description: "Put it Here" is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement,Here players need to place scattered items according to certain rules. A variety of interesting and healing levels are waiting for you to unlock!

name: Descensus
description: Descensus is a souls-like action-RPG with challenging combat set in post-catastrophe diesel punk world. The player's goal is to reach the heart of the mysterious Rift of the Fallen Star. It is necessary to stop the expansion and spread of the anomaly before it absorbs the whole world.

name: Sixth Force
description: A family-friendly action adventure for two players full of humor and heartfelt insights. Play together as a father and son trapped by hallucinating AI in secret neural network. Explore all ever-existing types of co-op and discover emerging combos! May the Sixth Force be with you!

name: Cryptrio
description: A monstrous match three arcade game with a twist! Connect the shapes in the right places to clear monsters from the dungeon and beat the bosses, all in the name of chasing the highest possible score.

name: Secrets of the Silent School
description: Secrets of the Silent School is a horror game in which you control a drone and must investigate the disappearance of students in a japanese school.

name: Capoeira Fighter
description: Flash game inspired by the Brazilian sport Capoeira, made by indie producer Spiritonin, founded by artists who had previously worked for Shockwave Software, Disney Interactive and other publishers. First game in what became a series.

name: Apartment of Death
description: Venture into the abandoned jungle apartment, embody lone survivor Ross, on a gripping adventure. College friends Joanna and Ivan went missing here. You must unravel mysteries room-by-room while evading a lurking killer's attacks. Can you pierce the enigmas and escape unscathed?

name: Demonic Deckmaster
description: Become a new commander in the army of Hell. Ascend the dungeon, craft your deck, and prove your worth to the King of Demons in this roguelike deck building game.

name: Sugar Tanks Arena
description: SugarTanks-Arena is an intense, fast-paced, and super-sweet tank arena shooter.Defeat all enemy tanks while dodging their bouncing bullets.Level by level they will get faster, smarter and deadlier.

name: CubeOS
description: Logic turn-based puzzle game, you play as a high-tech cube

name: Grimm's Folly
description:
In Grimm’s Folly, find yourself falling through a wormhole and landing in a trash heap. The world around you, dark and unfamiliar, is not your own. Someone has trapped you here. And that someone doesn’t ever want you to leave.

Grimm's Folly is a first person adventure puzzle game with a twist. Not only do you control the main character but you can also control a raven to help you explore the available areas, collect unique collectable and even fly through the game in 20 time trials.

name: Billo-Bricks
description: Save the World by destroying Bricks!

name: Hamburg: Neue Burg VR
description: Hamburg 1000 years ago: an immersive Virtual Reality Experience with a lot of interactive stations and a detailed reconstruction of a castle and the harbour in the year of 1024. Roam around freely or follow the guided tour in English language.

name: Ivri
description: IVRI immerses players in a gripping space adventure where they navigate an eerie, abandoned space station, meticulously piecing together the puzzle of the missing crew and uncovering the enigmatic secrets hidden within the ship's walls, delivering an enthralling narrative experience.

name: Dodge This
description: Gear up for a cinematic 3rd person multiplayer shooter that'll blow your mind. Dual-wield those bad boys and slip into your shootdodging-pants – it's time to unleash explosive slow-motion mayhem!

name: Dishwashing Simulator
description: A unique survival-farming-base-building-tycoon-horror game where you must survive through washing dishes. Explore mysterious depths, manage resources, and unravel a cryptic narrative. In DWS, a chore becomes a journey to freedom.

name: Haunt or Heist
description: Steal or be damned, the dirty work of the end of the month begins. Up to 4-player cooperative horror heist stealth action. Grab the money and stuff, and don't let them trick.

name: Amulet
description: Embark on a gothic hack-and-slash RPG in "Amulet." Shape your character with a unique "pure loot" system, choose your class, master weapons, and face evil creatures. Dynamic gameplay and a dark world await. Become the hero in "Amulet."

name: Gentoo Rescue
description: A puzzler about sliding penguins and walruses. Pickup items to push, pull, bounce, swap, stop, steal, or explode. Solve tightly-designed challenges in a world of puzzles inside puzzles inside puzzles.

name: Creatures After Calamity
description: Creatures After Calamity is an unsettling monster battler in which your animals remember how you treat them. Build a team and outsmart your opponents before your creatures turn on you.

name: Move Ball to Green
description: Draw and make the ball move to green zone!

name: Punch The Undead
description: The undead are attacking! With your fists of justice are you tough enough to beat them back to the grave?

name: Tower Of Lies
description: "Tower Of Lies": Horror platformer with gripping narrative, suspenseful atmosphere, and unique gameplay. Uncover chilling secrets, face nightmarish encounters, and shape your fate in a desolate, haunted world.

name: Book Smugglers
description: Join the courageous underground network of Book Smugglers in a grim decision-making, point-and-click, resource-management adventure as they risk everything to preserve their cultural heritage and ignite a flame of resistance.

name: Look Inside
description: Investigate the mysterious death of an unidentified young woman, in this shocking psychological thriller kinetic novel.

name: Demoniac TV
description: Destroy demoniac TVs with crazy powerups! Demoniac TV is a roguelite with a cyberpunk look that has its game flow in waves. Kill, buy weapons and become stronger! In this mission, exorcising is your final destination.

name: Over Islands
description: Travel from island to island, build a thriving flying city, battle air pirates aboard your zeppelin, and make important decisions as you dive into ancient temples to defeat the children of the goddess and slay their demonic armies.

name: Camera Lens
description: This is a maze game with simple graphics but equally rich content.

name: No Gasoline
description: A Co-Op/Solo, Adventure-Simulation-Puzzle game. Build your vehicle to overcome the obstacles it will encounter along the way. Find new parts by solving puzzles. Take care of your vehicle. Don't run out of fuel. Explore unique places and stories through the journey.

name: Outbreak Zombie Plague
description: sarah is a 21 year old university student who's kidnaped on her way home. and wakes up inside a secret facility is a research facility that studies deadly bacteria and viruses. searching for a vaccine to repair dead cells and cell regeneration.

name: Fleximan
description: Simple, you're Fleximan and you have to remove all the speed cameras in the city.

name: Jolly Rogers Pirates Rumble
description: JRPR in short is an Action Arena fighting game. It is a local multiplayer shared screen game which needs at least 2 players locally to play. Players control different Pirates and compete to win! How do you win? Nice and easy, just push your enemies of the arena or figure out what do with your Pirate powers.

name: Kneedle Knight
description: Kneedle Knight is a 3rd-person puzzle platformer game. Conjure fabric with a magic needle as Sir Lukoss the Small and merge in and out of fabric. Solve puzzles, platform across magical objects, and defeat cursed candle minions to return Sir Lukoss to normal and defeat the Witch of Fabric!

name: Extirpate
description: Extirpate is an open-world survival where one will face a fight against hungry zombies and relentless survivors. Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosives, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources. Will you survive or become another victim?

name: Construction Runner
description: A very simple Jump ’n’ Run game where you are running through a construction site.

name: Speglar
description: Frantic 4-player laser ricocheting top-down shooter. Keep it casual and enjoy the chaos, or master the surprisingly deep mechanics to obliterate your enemies. Duke it out locally in free-for-all or 2v2.

name: Survival Story
description: Survival Story is a unique immersion into the world of survival, where every step is a struggle for life. In this exciting game you have to survive in an apocalyptic world where dangers await at every corner, from hunger and thirst to the invasion of the creepy walking dead.

name: Deus Proxy
description: Deus Proxy is a roguelike that brings together the most exciting aspects of new-school auto battlers and old-school tabletop gaming. Every game is a completely new adventure with 15 factions, human opponents, and hundreds of heroes, items, traits, and spells!

name: Got Simulator
description: Hatsune Miku invades the earth in this action game. You can grow your hair and destroy the buildings and more...

name: RPG Maker With
description: RPG MAKER WITH lets you make games for and with everyone! No programming knowledge is required to make your perfect game when using RPG MAKER WITH’s robust yet easy-to-learn tools and intuitive controls. Get inspiration and motivation by playing other creators’ games for free and sharing your projects and assets online at any stage of the creation process.

name: The Last Faith: The Nycrux Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: For Honor: Ultimate Edition
description: Choose the Ultimate Edition which includes 12 additional heroes with unique playstyles to get the best experience in For Honor!

name: Empire of the Ants: Limited Edition
description:
TAKE PART TO AN EPIC JOURNEY: Take the role of a brave ant, with a 3rd person view and explore the abilities that can help you in battle and exploration.

The Limited Edition includes:
- The Full Game
- Steelbook cover
- Exclusive Lithograph art prints
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Tower: The Noise Update
description: The long-awaited Noise Update is finally here! Bringing you The Noise in all his glory in the form of a pseudo New Game+, revisiting the events of Pizza Tower through the eyes of the yellow gremlin, with perhaps a few twists along the way.

name: Sunsoft Collection 2
description:
Sunsoft is back on Evercade with another great collection! 7 games from the famous Japanese developer are here to enjoy on one physical cartridge.

A selection of 8, 16 and 32-bit games including Ufouria: The Saga, Blaster Master: Enemy Below, Aero the Acro-Bat 2, Zero the Kamikaze Squirrel, Daze Before Christmas, Galaxy Fight: Universal Warriors and the first localised release of Pri Pri Primitive Princess!

name: Piko Interactive Collection 4
description:
Piko Interactive Collection 4 contains 10 great games from the history of retro gaming, including Evercade's first game from a 64-bit platform with the 64-bit version of cult classic Glover!

The games included are Glover, Risky Woods, Street Racer, Zero Tolerance Underground, Target: Renegade, Sküljagger: Revolt of the Westicans, Bad Street Brawler, Mermaids of Atlantis: The Riddle of the Magic Bubble, Star X and The Fidgetts.

name: Capybara: The Story of Sisyphus
description: Capybara: The Story of Sisyphus is a game about a very lazy capybara who wants to take a bath at the top of the mountain. To do this, the capybara must gain speed and cling to the obstacles with a rope with a barrel so as not to fall!

name: Realm Of I
description: Realm Of I is an action-adventure-platformer styled with low-res yet detailed pixel art.

name: Phineas and Ferb: Across the Second Dimension
description: Compared to the home console version, only Phineas, Ferb, Perry and Terry the Turtle are playable, there are different sorts of levels with different sorts of gameplay to them, and there are different sorts of gear.

name: Oceanarium World
description: Build your ultimate aquarium and water park! Manage marine park and make it successful by building aquariums and attractions. Display beautiful, rare or monstrous fishes that your visitors demand and make them satisfied.

name: Legend of Ramen
description: Sin descripción

name: Mystified Cat
description: Move the cat through the moving platforms to catch the fish.

name: Pikmin 2 Power-Cut
description: A Pikmin 2 mod where you get to recover the energy owed by the president's wife.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2
description: Exclusive to the Wii version are characters that were not included in the PS2 version such as Appule, Cyborg Tao, Demon King Piccolo, Frieza Soldier and Pilaf Machine.

name: Maritime Mecha Mystery
description: A dinner party attended by Germanic gods takes a dark turn when the host gets attacked. Can you uncover the truth and catch the assailant?

name: Piki 2
description: A Pikmin 2 romhack with new areas and caves, and remixed treasures and enemies. Made by Antopikmin

name: Pikmin 2 Kaizo Edition
description: A kaizo hack for Pikmin 2 with harder enemies, cave layouts and Pikmin requirements. Made by EBTKS Paddy.

name: Breachers VR
description: Breachers VR is an immersive virtual reality (VR) experience that plunges players into intense, action-packed scenarios where they take on the role of elite operatives known as "Breachers." Set in a futuristic world, players must use their tactical skills and quick reflexes to breach, infiltrate, and neutralize various targets. With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, Breachers VR offers an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience that transports players into the heart of covert operations like never before.

name: Jungle Max
description: Control the famous hero, Jungle Max.

name: Neon Net
description: Dive into the neon-lit virtual world as a hacker detective fighting rebellious AI programs, inspired by the "Tron" movie. Unleash hacking skills in a 'Minesweeper'-style game with RPG elements, save the virtual world from chaos while questioning who you are - human or another AI?

name: Unread Messages
description: Help texts get to their destinations by drawing connections between cell towers. This is the Ludum Dare 53 version of the game.

name: Green Thumb
description: The goal in each level is to collect the needed number of coins by growing different crops. You have limited resources, so keep an eye on how much water, fertilizer, and seeds you have left and use them wisely to grow your garden before you run out of actions.

name: Punchline
description: Punchline is an RPG and card management game where you live the life of a fighter. Strengthen your character through training, and as you control their life, engage in battles using cards to defeat your opponents.

name: Incoherence
description: What started as a relaxing day off with your partner suddenly takes a turn when you find yourself waking up alone at the metro station of a creepy, abandoned complex owned by a mysterious megacorporation...

name: River Attack
description: Embark on an exciting journey inspired by classics, facing challenges along the river, rescuing refugees, and demolishing obstacles. Acquire airplanes, collect power-ups, and choose between Classic and Mission modes. An intense experience awaits you!

name: Dodge
description: Bullet hell with the mouse.

name: Subterror
description: At the bottom of the ocean floor lie The Biospheres. These weather-controlled domes once supported vast arrays of lifeforms, but have since been abandoned. Explore arid deserts, dark forests, and frozen tundras. But don't stay too late, as you are not alone out in the great abyss.

name: Guardian Goddess
description: The heroine with a mysterious past gets a job in a store in the underworld. A male doll will help her with this work.

name: Recon Quest
description: A top down vehicular shooter, in which the player attempts to accomplish various level goals. There are four specialized vehicles, each one with unique abilities and limitations.

name: Lightspeed
description: You're the only human in a huge, robotic space ship, flying at incredible speeds through deep space. Your mission: find and settle a new planet where humanity can thrive. Combat is inevitable, but you'll need more than flying skills to succeed.

name: Forgiveness
description: Forgiveness is a first-person ambient horror fps game set in the late eighties. After divorcing his wife Emma, Ben moves into the old house where his mother Amanda used to live. While moving in, he realizes that some strange things have been happening in his mother's house.

name: Posthaste!
description: Postbound! is an arcade-style sorting game following your journey as a novice postal worker. In this casual, light-hearted, and family-friendly game filled with humor, you must correctly sort mail into the appropriate boxes before time runs out, while dealing with the Postmaster and Post Inspector!

name: Hexis
description: Hexagons attack from all directions! Redirect them to form lines and make them vanish. How high can you score before they pile up too high?

name: Insane
description: First person shoot，exploration games, as well as more multiplayer modes (currently in development). In this game, as an employee, you discover an abnormal phenomenon in your area. You wake up in the workplace, prepare your equipment, and to explore

name: Hiraeth
description: HIRAETH is a game about mind-bending puzzles and unique platforming challenges, all with stunning graphics and physics-defying mechanics. The overarching plot is a puzzle as in of itself, and the ever-present music elevates the game's dreamy atmosphere.

name: Space Crafter
description: Go on an adventure in the footsteps of an ancient civilisation. Explore hostile planets, build your base and acquire the technologies of the past before they are turned to create chaos.

name: The Darkside Detective Duology
description:
Grab your trench coat, tune your sixth sense and join the Darkside Division as they investigate the outright bizarre, the downright dangerous and the confusing cases of Twin Lakes. Flesh-hungry tentacles, mafian zombies, and the occasional missing sock are no match for The Darkside Detective.

- About The Darkside Detective

Where cultists crawl, where demons dwell, where the occult… occults? *ahem* That's where you’ll find Detective Francis McQueen, the lead investigator of the criminally underfunded Darkside Division. When evil darkens the doorsteps of Twin Lakes City – hell, even when it just loiters around shop fronts or hangs out in shady alleyways – he’s there, ready to investigate the cases that nobody else will.

- About The Darkside Detective: Fumble in the Dark

Twin Lakes is a cursed city. Less cursed than say, “Demons are tearing it apart” but more cursed than “always loses its keys” or “often steps in puddles”. It’s roughly in the middle of the cursed scale, is what we’re trying to say.

Cursed enough that it’s a nuisance. Cursed enough that somebody has to deal with it…

That’s where The Darkside Detective comes in. Whenever you hear a bump in the night, feel a tingle up your spine, or smell something fishy, Detective Francis McQueen isn’t far behind. No, he doesn’t smell of fish - it’s a phrase, come on...

name: Jolly Chimp Champ
description: In this action puzzler for the Playdate, the crank controls the game's elements which you must use to navigate the stubborn, sedentary chimp to the goal of each level.

name: Air Stacky
description:
Air Stacky is a casual balancing game. Take control of Stacky, a drone tasked with gathering boxes of various sizes !

This game was part of a game jam called "TobuJam 3".

name: HexoCity
description: Build a futuristic city on a lush archipelago, personalizing each step with unique tiles. Strategize for high scores in this serene city-builder.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 - Collector's Edition
description: The European "Collector's Edition" version of Budokai 3 was released in Fall 2005. Months before, the hype began to build that it would include not only the option to select the Japanese vocal track for the characters in the game, but that the Japanese version's extras would also be available for unlocking. The Platinum Version is identical to the Collector's Edition. The "Baba Crystal Ball Movies" are also available on this version after extensive game play. Several forums have posted the process needed to gain these capsules, which can be bought in the capsule store. However, the content of the movies are simply the original Japanese introduction to Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2. One clip is the intro with vocal accompaniment while the second clip is the instrumental version of the intro

name: Astrodle
description: A colorful, undemanding, idle shooter. Collect the essences of the 12 Zodiac Signs to ascend amongst them.

name: LesbiAnts
description: LesbiAnts: Our New Morphology is a retro horror-RPG made for the Game Boy! It features easy-to-use, menu-based combat, top-down exploration, and player upgrades in the form of biotic evolutions. Play through the story in about 45 minutes to 1 hour as your colony of Sisters fights to secure the mysterious seeds in each of 4 explorable areas. Try not to lose any Sisters in simple, yet rewarding combat against a variety of grotesque and unnerving creepy-crawlies. But even if one falls, the others must carry on and tend to both the Queen they love, and their new brood of rapidly-growing eggs~

name: Einstein's Cats
description: Cats in boxes; alive or dead? Wait, no, no this isn’t Schroedinger. This is Einstein’s Cats! A cozy, relaxing logic puzzle game about cats and boxes; which cats go where? But be careful, you know how picky cats can be!

name: Bee Welcome!
description: Bee Welcome! is the name of this Hidden Object game AND the name of your bee hotel. Only the most adorable bees will be your guests. Find them among dozens of others!

name: Glyphica: Typing Survival
description: Glyphica is a typing-roguelike that blends survival and strategy. Type to shoot. Test your keyboard mastery, unlock powerful upgrades, and craft overpowered builds to destroy hordes of enemies.

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Solaris Showdown
description: Join Duncan Fisher in a race against time to thwart the overthrow of the Solaris Council, discover the new Loader King 'Mech, collect 11 new Gladiator 'Mech variants, select new weapons and equipment tailored for close-quarter engagements, and help save the very future of Solaris

name: Manahex
description: Build your own deck and battle other mages in a world of fantasy and magic. Take control of the hexes on the board to gain mana and pay for spells and creatures.
