name: Super Icarus
description: Score points by flying close to the edge of the screen, but not too close! Colliding will drop mines & make things more difficult.

name: Copter
description: Copter is a simple, casual action game with interesting controls: the Playdate hand crank. Help a helicopter navigate to avoid obstacles and try to beat your own high scores.

name: Xjump
description:
A game where you jump up and up while the tower collapses under your feet. The objective of the game is to climb as high as you can before you fall.

The speed in which the tower falls grows linearly with time until it reaches a certain threshold. Also, the player can jump higher by first moving sideways, mastering sideways jumps in any given situation, such as a small platform is crucial.

There are a few different themes (skins), which the player can choose.

name: Combi Pool
description: A game where you hit pool balls against each other.

name: Gem Jam
description: You've found a warehouse with more rooms than you can count, each with a crate full of gems. The only snag is that the gems are packed in amongst tons of other boxes. You'll need to shuffle things around so that you can bring the gems to the exit and get rich.

name: Fighting Vipers
description:
Exclusive to the Sega Saturn version of the game is Pepsiman, the mascot for the Pepsi Company in Japan.

Other exclusive features to the Saturn version include the addition of Playback Mode and Training Mode.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Doom Mod Remake
description: A remake of FNAF1 Doom mod, FNAF1Remake is an upgrade on all aspects. Graphics, Gameplay, Unending Chaos. 1-8 Players.

name: Omega Zone
description: A port of Omega Race for PICO-8. Kill all enemies to advance to the next level. Use the shield to avoid enemy fire and the rotating lasers. Collect yellow coins for the bonus level.

name: Cock Soccer
description: Multiplayer, arcade-style, 2.5D sports game with multiple customizable characters to choose from, chaotic gameplay that fuses soccer with some beat 'em up elements, and maps with traps that can change the course of the match in unexpected ways.

name: Untitled Dungeons & Dragons Game
description: A game by Gameloft in developement for PC and consoles.

name: New World
description: Colonize and exploit the New World.

name: Stellaris: The Machine Age
description: It is an age of technological glory, rapid social change, and unbridled ambition… But in the depths of space, a danger unlike any before encountered is about to emerge, a looming threat that will throw the very meaning of life into question.Welcome to The Machine Age!

name: Dark Blood: Beyond the Darkness
description: Darkblood -Beyond the Darkness- is a turn-based, card-based dungeon-crawler roguelike RPG developed for offline mobile play by Toihaus Games.

name: R.I.P. Curl
description: R.I.P. Curl is a scientifically accurate surfing simulator featuring four different playable characters, four rounded corners, and many many many waves, sharks and bombs.

name: Dark Blood 2:The Cry of Souls
description:
DarkBlood2 -The Cry of Souls- is the sequel to DarkBlood -Beyond the Darkness-.

The game adds a story, a central town, stores, and a day/night cycle.

name: Puzzle Garage
description: Online puzzles is a logic game for adults and children that can be played on a computer, tablet or smartphone. Multiplayer Puzzles is an online version of the game for several players.

name: F-out
description: A futuristic racing video game for the Playdate console.

name: Divineko
description:
You play as a cat who casts spells by drawing increasingly complex shapes that match incoming enemies.

Throughout your journey, you will meet a wide range of enemy archetypes with unique gameplay mechanics, challenging bosses, and you will acquire divine abilities along the way (e.g. block attacks, slow down time, hit all enemies on screen). These abilities will help you rise to the top of the leaderboard in the Endless mode and achieve your end goal: establish your authority as the god of cats, the Divineko!

name: Dice Life: Dice Game
description: A town-building game involving dice rolls that Jelly Button developed but never fully released before Playtika shut down their studio.

name: Canyon Rush
description: Navigate treacherous canyons in this thrilling trap runner game, Canyon Rush! Test your reflexes, master the traps, and climb the leaderboards in an adrenaline-pumping adventure. Are you ready to conquer the canyon?

name: Cards with Personalities Classic
description:
In Cards with Personalities Classic, players take on the role of a humble hero trying to assemble a team of great personalities to defeat the weird bosses that roam the lands.

Each turn, you will play cards from your hand to gain Gold, Attack or other effects (like converting monsters to your side). You can spend Gold to acquire new cards from your deck. Attack is used to slay monsters, which earns you Gold and other cool effects. The battlefield is always changing so you have to adapt and come up with new strategies to defeat all eight bosses!

name: Hebereke
description: Hebereke is a side-scrolling platform game set in a free-roaming environment. The game's world comprises interconnected areas which consist of outdoor sections, caves, water, and other thematic places with platform structures and wandering enemies.

name: Mini-Metroid
description: Mini-Metroid is a Metroid fan game by Scott Cawthon.

name: Keeper Practise
description:
A flash game from a collection from Warner Bros. circa 2001. The collection included games such as Sorting Hat, Wand Shop, Keeper Practise, Seeker Practise, Beater Practise and Chaser Practise.

In this game, the player controls the keeper with the mouse defending the 3 goal posts as an oponnent chaser approaches and shoots towards one of the three goal posts and must react when the ball is near the keeper. A hanging jewel flashes red when the ball is reacheable. The player is allowed three "lives" and must aim for a highscore.

name: Destiny 2: Into The Light
description: Destiny 2: Into the Light will deliver new game content, available for all players, throughout the months of April and May in preparation for the launch of The Final Shape in June.

name: Luta de Gladiadores
description:
It was a dark time forged in blood and steel. The people gathered in arenas to watch violent battles, where only real warriors were able to survive. Amid all this chaos, a story of valor and courage began. Titus, the great fighter, surprised the empire and managed to defeat all the gladiators to be released.

The game is a series of one on one gladiator fights with increasingly stronger opponents. Between each fight there is a text screen with a description of the next oponnent which also serves to advance the story. Winning each fight unlocks progress towards the next weapon, which can be equipped for the next fight. The player can move forward, backwards, raise the shield or attack, all in real time. The strategy is to know when to defend and when to attack.

name: Love Memory Mimic
description: Sin descripción

name: Solar Wolf
description: SolarWolf is originally based on Atari 2600's SolarFox. The point of the game is to scramble through 60 levels collecting space boxes. Each level gets harder. Obstacles like bullets, mines, and asteroids cover your every move. Beat the Skip timer and grab the powerups for your only chance.

name: Dolphin Olympics
description:
Dolphin Olympics is an awesome game of skill in which you must control and acrobatic dolphin and try to perform a variety of cool tricks! You only have a time limit of two minutes and within this time limit you must rack up a high score by trying out different tricks and landing them successfully.

Use the arrow keys to control the movement of your dolphin - build up speed underwater first before you launch out of the water and perform huge jumps. Use the down arrow to perform corkscrew spins, and use the left and right arrows to perform front and back flips. You gain points for each completed trick, and also for a perfect re-entry into the water. What high score can you register in Dolphin Olympics?

name: Into Space!
description: Run a mission, get as high as possible, receive money, buy upgrades, go higher, rinse and repeat.

name: Paper Pilot
description: Guide your paper plane through challenging, twisty courses.

name: Laser Sphere
description: An arcade game exclusively for the Playdate. This uses the crank to aim a giant laser across the screen at waves of enemies.

name: Deadly Disco
description: This is a high score chaser where you dance on a collapsing floor to gain points.

name: Golden Bazaar: Game of Tycoon!
description: An idle Business simulation game with a retro art style.

name: Adventures of Polo
description: Adventures of Polo is a puzzle adventure game for the Playdate handheld console. It is inspired by Lolo for the NES and other similar games.

name: One Night: Burlesque - Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Vast Future: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DIY Paper Doll: Stylish Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Woodturning 3D: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Around The World: Travel To Brazil - Collector's Edition
description: An unforgettable vacation in Brazil.

name: Arcade Archives: Mouser
description:
"MOUSER" is an action game released by UPL in 1983.
Take control of the tomcat Nyanta and rescue his lover Mariya from her mouse captors!
The tricky mice will come at you with all sorts of surprises.
Nyanta will need all your luck and help to make it back with his fiancée!

name: Aha! Let's Photo Hunt!
description: Sin descripción

name: Capybara, Ducks, Rats and Bananas Bundle
description: This bundle contains lots of Capybara, Duck, Mouse and Banana! Get Ducky Quacky + Capybara Madness + Ratyboy Adventures + Revenge of Banana in one bundle with good price!

name: Cooking Arena Pizza Yolo
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Drop DX
description: Monster Hunt for up to 3 players simultaneously!

name: Darkness and Flame
description: A story of a young girl involved in the battle between Darkness and Flame.

name: Ecchi Paradise
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Fear: Hide And Seek Horror
description: An exciting horror puzzle game in which the player needs to escape from an abandoned house from a maniac... This is a real escape simulator!

name: Labyrinthia Nightmares: The Journey of Little Fluffypuff
description: Unleash your courage in this epic adventure. Explore, solve, conquer the labyrinth's challenges.

name: Sushi Shot Online
description:
Aim your sushi and shoot!
Battle against players from all over the world!

name: Sector 98
description: Bzzt Bzzt! SECTOR failure! Some robots were infected after a cyber attack on the lab's main system. It's impossible to remove the virus, We have to destroy these robots, I know it's not nice to destroy your friends, but..

name: Re:Cento
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyanzou & Kumakichi Bomb Cave
description: Avoid bombs, break the wall and proceed through the cave

name: ToyBox Easter
description: The Easter toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Easter has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Western Frontier
description: An action shooter in which Billy, an assassin, fights in the frontier days of the West!

name: Fortunate Duo: Kyouun Youhei to Houseki no Hime-kishi
description: Humanity was considered weak compared to other species. The princess knight and the mercenary rise up to defeat the Demon King.

name: Hentai Girls Panic
description: Classic casual arcade game in puzzle style.

name: Hole io: Party Animals
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: WorldNeverland: Berry Donut Fair
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Paradise: Fantasy Babes
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Paradise: Kinky Chicks
description: Sin descripción

name: Infantry Attack
description:
Soldier! War is coming and duty calls!
Enemies are invading our country and we need YOU to defend it!

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Premium Drive Pass Season 4
description: Purchase the Premium Drive Pass for Season 4 to unlock the ability to earn a total of 84 Premium Rewards at your own pace, including 9 Vehicles, 10 Drivers, and more!

name: Farmer Simulator Evolution: Farming Tractor
description: Sin descripción

name: Cartel Tycoon: Deluxe Edition
description: Cartel Tycoon is a survival business sim inspired by the ‘80s narco trade.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fitness Club
description: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity.

name: Bing In Wonderland: Deluxe Edition
description: A Roguelite monster killing satisfaction galore without any exploration elements. The game is filled to the brim with exotic enemies and stages with a collection of deep and robust boons, weapons, and items plus an abundance of pointless features and useless details.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Succubus With Guns: Costume "Joy of Succubus"
description: Delight your Demoness with a new costume!

name: Save from Bobr Curve
description: You find yourself in an unusual forest with anomalies and a huge mutant beaver is chasing you.

name: Secret Odyssey: Orb of Eternity
description: Embark on a journey through the Quantum Complex, where ancient wisdom and futuristic puzzles collide. Navigate through hidden chambers and cryptic challenges to unveil a secret that binds reality and technology. Master intricate puzzles, unlock the mysteries, and discover the power of the cyber orb.

name: Elfenberg
description: Step into the realm of elves in this magical city-builder-meets-deck-builder mix. Instantly place buildings with cards, choose wisely, and maintain a delicate balance of resources, city development, and harmony with nature in your surroundings.

name: Red Memory
description: Honoring history and preserving the spirit of heroes, "Red Memories" invites you to immerse yourself in this historical journey. Get ready to delve into this chapter of "Red Memories" and feel the historic moments of struggle for peace.

name: Succubus With Guns: Campaign "Winding Path"
description: New campaign consisting of 5 lengthy missions. Even more enemies and more epic battles!

name: Shadow Walker
description: So you want to become a shadow walker? In this game, you walk through a 4x4 grid of rooms, fighting your way through shadow biomes to prove your strength. During the day, you can see perfectly fine, but as night falls, your visibility is dimed, and that is when you are truly tested.

name: Valefor
description: A Tactical Auto-Battler set in a Dark Fantasy world- complete with Roguelike Dungeons, a PVP Arena, Crafting and Kingdom Building.

name: Morpi Card Mix
description: BUILD your deck, SUMMON morpis, PLAY cards to UPGRADE your morpis and FIGHT against evil forces. Think and act fast in this real-time roguelike deck-builder game!

name: Stardust Demon
description:
Stardust Demon is a retro metroidvania adventure about exploring alien planets. It features a mixture of challenges, from platforming to fighting to solving puzzles. Power up with an array of abilities and many hidden upgrades and secrets.

Experience the story featuring quirky demons and aliens. And many hidden rooms await in the depths of the planets to test your skill and knowledge of Algol's powers.

name: Save and Survive
description: The player needs to survive in the forest. Where dangerous monsters live.

name: Hollow Earth
description: A horror game where you attempt to rescue a team of lost cavers.

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Gold & Pearls"
description: Adds six brand new dice sets for rolling all those hard-to-roll numbers in Dice-Zee! Maybe they won't add any luck, but at least you'll do it in style!

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Novosibirsk
description: This DLC adds the city of Novosibirsk and its railway station to the game. On your way along the Trans-Siberian Railway you stop in Novosibirsk to stroll around the city.

name: Looking for Cold Girls
description: In this world, materials are in short supply. You must gather enough supplies if you want to escape. There are a total of 24 different props distributed throughout the scene. Every time you find an item, you will earn some gold, and your Allies will regularly replenish you with some gold.

name: Desert Witch
description: An open-world action game in which you eliminate enemies with a sniper rifle, often from very long distances. The game area is a desert locally built with low and high buildings in which you can hide or take a shooting position.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - US Creator
description: The US Creators Pack is a brand new DLC for Monsters & Mortals that adds the popular American YouTube Creator, CoryXKenshin, to the game!

name: Just Stack
description: Just Stack is a simple and addictive casual game where you stack randomly spawned objects as high as possible. Challenge your limits to see how high you can stack surreal objects using Unreal Engine 5's beautiful graphics.

name: Merk Mayhem
description: Get ready for a thrilling semi-futuristic shooter game! Choose from three kits, master movement speeds, and restore armor with drops from fallen enemies. Casual or competitive, suit up for a battle like no other.

name: WooLoop: Aquatic Pack
description: Aquatic GalleryThis Aquatic-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore the depths of our wonderful planet with this water-based gallery!

name: Despot Zombie
description: The AI within could be humanity's salvation…or its end. Experience mind-bending combat, explore a dark fantasy wasteland, and unravel a twisted tale as Kurt, humanity's unwilling hope.

name: Otto's Escape
description: Help Otto escape a tall tower by individually controlling his jetpack's two boosters to steer and climb your way though 20 hazard-filled floors. Just try not to run out of fuel along the way!

name: Museum Mystery
description: Museum Mystery is a deck-building, story-driven roguelite adventure where museum exhibits come to life, wreaking chaos. Explore halls from different eras, battle works of art, collect your own deck of artifacts, and solve the mystery!

name: Creation of a God
description: The game mixes elements of platforming, puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious God. Only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown!

name: Idle Spiral: Custom Spiral Pack
description: Support the endless spiraling adventure of Idle Spiral with this exclusive DLC pack!

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy RB Pack
description: Play as famed legacy Running Backs Marshawn Lynch, Marshall Faulk, and Emmitt Smith, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Jump Pals
description: Jump Pals is an endless high-score-chasing platformer about rapidly switching characters to collect as many coins as possible. Use each of the 8 characters' special abilities to jump gaps, stomp monsters, and smash platforms until you can beat all levels in a single attempt.

name: Who Murdered My Empress?
description: “Who Murdered My Empress?” is a visually stunning romance visual novel set in a fantastical realm inspired by 19th century Vietnam. Assume the role of an Empress with a lavish harem of captivating men as you navigate intrigue, love, and mystery.

name: Princess x Audience
description: Sin descripción

name: Ola! Borijin Hore Yuke! Brazil
description: A boring game like bowling that actually is not boring! Let’s go to Brazil from Japan!

name: Confronted
description: A terrifying first-person survival horror game where building cover to hide is your only refuge against the unspeakable terrors within Radu Castle.

name: Nora Wanna Rise
description: "Nora Wanna Rise" is a parkour game where players guide Nora through castles, cities, and a space station. Mastering agility and strategy, they face unique challenges in each setting. It's a blend of adventure and skill, captivating players with its dynamic gameplay.

name: AX: Portal Slayers
description: AX: Portal Slayers is a free-to-play action PVP third-person FPS game. Set in the realm where reality and fantasy intersect, players defeat monsters to enhance their abilities. Utilize various tactical items to achieve victory in battles against other players.

name: Hack Deep
description: A multiplayer cooperative sci-fi 3D action-adventure game. Dive into the depths of the maze with multiple players and bring back treasures.

name: Sidereal Wanderer
description: As Captain, you must lead your spaceship to defeat the rebel forces scattered across the galaxy. Scour the sectors for enemies and remain alert! Determine the right coordinates and torpedo your foe down.

name: Argyle Manor, Book 1: Away From The Sun
description: Explore a haunted mansion gallery filled with 3D animated art - and ghosts - to unlock a full-length illustrated audiobook

name: Magic Runes
description: Magic Runes - An exciting 3D game with adventure elements. You have to go on a dangerous adventure across a mysterious island full of ancient dinosaurs. Your goal is to cleanse the lands of darkness and return peace and tranquility to these lands!

name: Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands - Premium Edition
description: Support Iris and Robin and help them to win the Magical Tournament in "Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands"! With help from new and old friends, new improvements to the farm, and unique upgrades, this Time Management game will have you occupied for hours!

name: Magic Caster
description: Dive into a fast-paced wizard world where drawing gestures becomes your power! Defeat monsters, unleash potent spells, and expertly navigate the bullet hell to experience a new level of gaming excitement.

name: No.996 Magic Tower
description: This game is a strategy RPG with the theme of anti-work from 9 am to 9 pm, six days a week. The gameplay inherits from the classic "Magic Tower" series, combining elements such as pigeons and BD combinations. Please play with caution under the age of 35 to avoid dissing and hurting the boss!

name: Magic Seeker: A Mimic's Odyssey - Chapter 1
description: Welcome to world of "MAGIKA". A turn-based game, with an intriguing story filled with mimics, creatures who can be anything that is around you, so always be prepared for a fight!

name: Red Magic
description: This is a unique puzzle game, once played, you will definitely be impressed and fall in love with this game.

name: Gugong
description: Gugong is a board game with hand management and influence as its core mechanisms. The gift cards you offer as a player have to be of a higher value than the one you receive, forcing you to make strategic choices regarding which actions you want to take each turn.

name: Kitiplant
description: Adorable cats work together to solve puzzles in Kitiplant. Guide them through challenging grid-based levels, where they must share resources and carefully manage their energy to restore life to once-dormant forests.

name: Mecha Mayhem
description: Tear your enemies limb from limb and protect your faction from the enemy mechs. This rogue-like lets you mix and match body parts to fully customise your brawler for combat. Cause chaos in this physics-based mech fighter! Build & share your own levels in our forge mode!

name: Ilavath: Battle Arenas
description: ILAVATH, is a Team Based Strategy game that draws inspiration ancient legends of India. The war for Amruth (Elixir of Immortaility) has disturbed the cosmic balance. To restore balance, the tri-gods created Ilavath, a realm where heroes from all races battle for Moksha.

name: Squigley
description: Traverse and experience a massive, cohesive 2D world as Squigley. Use your wits, resources and unique movement mechanics in order to explore this dark digital world.

name: Bots & Mods
description: Bots & Mods is a workshop sim game. Craft robot components. Design and assemble robots to assist you or put them up for sale. Be ready for market fluctuations and manage your relationship with the gangs.

name: Save Twiks
description: “Save Twiks” - psychological horror from the first person. The Kitten named Twiks us lost in a giant train and you will have to go though real horror to find it. “Did you hear this? I think he just meowed in next car”.

name: Ravva and the Netherworld Train
description: Embark on the Netherworld Train with Ravva! Behold a new power to fuse with each of their companions, and explore the dangers of the land of the dead! A cute pixel-art platformer adventure awaits you!

name: Interstellar Distress
description: A 4 player co-op horror where you answer distress calls and board spaceships in search of survivors.

name: Ascent of the Dragon
description: In a world where dragons conquered the world and humanity's last hope is... Ah, who are we kidding. Are you pretending to work? Are you in need of an escape to continue the charade? Then this game is something you need! While your boss thinks you're busy clicking, your dragon does the flicking.

name: Spoils of a Starfighter
description: A space survival roguelike where you upgrade your ship over the course of the game, and unlock new ships and weapon mods as you progress over multiple games.

name: Nooch Farm
description: Nooch Farm is a relaxing/colourful Puzzle game with a fun choice based story! Organise the food on the farm into rows, use your smarts to figure out the combinations! Talk to the animals, get to know their hopes and dreams and discover the motivations behind the residents in Nooch Farm!

name: Ooka Ooka Adventure
description: Ooka Ooka Adventure is an adorable 2 player co-op puzzle platformer! Join the Ookas, Ooka Bing and Ooka Ping, on their journey as they gather the Great Bananas! Take control of Ooka Ping or Ooka Bing, either using gamepads, or with the mouse and keyboard!

name: Autofahrt
description: A storm is gathering and devouring everything. Drive for your life alone or with friends and escape the deadly storm. Repair and keep your vehicle intact, it's the only way to reach the bunker and survive.

name: KunKun's Dream of Horror
description: I know you saw him think of an old friend. Yes, you are already trapped in Kunkuns dream. You need to find a way to escape and avoid these ghosts and animals with your trapped companions. Some ghosts and animals like to play basketball worship chickens, dislike watermelons, and even come and show me

name: Death tree
description: This is a puzzle game that requires your eyes and hands to work together to score.

name: Black plane
description: This is a maze adventure game.

name: La Llorona Wants Your Soul
description: La Llorona wants your soul offers a unique horror experience based on real events that occurred in Mexico, follw the tormented soul of a woman who lost her children and every night roams the town in search of them and the one who took them. In this story, you control a group of 4 paranormal investigators seeking to solve the mystery and find La Llorona's children to free the pain of the restless soul.

name: Ctrl.Alt.Deal
description: With your superior intelligence and sneakiness, you can find a way to escape from this heartless megacorp! (As long as no one realizes you’re actually a self-aware AI...) Spy on humans, offer them deals, and negotiate your way to freedom in a turn-based strategy game of corporate dysfunction.

name: Grog 'n Glory
description: Avast, ye scallywags! Dive headfirst into the rollicking world of "Grog 'n Glory," which thrusts you into the heart of the high seas as a cunning captain. Manage your crew, customize your ship, and navigate the treacherous waters as you plunder and raid your way to infamy. Live the pirate's life.

name: SuperSpec Rallycross
description: SuperSpec Rallycross delivers a captivating retro-style top-down arcade racing experience. Immerse yourself in authentic rallycross action, enhanced by vibrant anime-inspired visuals and playful physics-based handling, ensuring every race is a thrilling adventure.

name: Kowloon Story 2
description: Kowloon Story 2 | 九龙诡录2 is a horror-themed first-person adventure game in Hong Kong, China. It tells the bizarre story of a beautiful single college girl working late at night in a barbecued pork restaurant......

name: Coin Jar
description: A physics-based incremental game where you drop coins into a jar and buy upgrades to get more coins, a bigger jar, and even unlock auto coin dropping while you idle. Coin fall down, number go up!

name: Further
description: Embark on an odyssey beyond the stars in "Further," a spellbinding virtual reality adventure that defies the limits of space and imagination. Assume the role of Alex, a fearless protagonist thrust into an interstellar realm of trials, puzzles, and encounters with extraterrestrial entities.

name: Death Valley
description: This is a casual game.

name: Skid Island: Asphalt Mayhem
description: Drift, jump and be fast, make cash and tune your cars! Upgrade your ride for smoother drifts and challenge other players.

name: Pim World
description: In the game you will lead your settlement. You will have to build various buildings starting with a castle and ending with an institute. Every decision you make should be balanced, because the economy of your settlement is growing, and the lack of resources can catch up instantly!

name: Just Get There
description: Embark on a creative tower-climbing adventure! Conquer diverse levels, explore, don't fall and Just Get There! Choose leisurely exploration or race against time. Dive into Sandbox for limitless creativity and face dynamic challenges. Balance risk and reward in this exhilarating puzzle platformer!

name: Re into Another World
description: "Re into Another World" is an RPG adventure game set in a fantasy world. Players need to accumulate souls by challenging monsters, using these souls to unlock characters in order to defeat the final demon. Character growth and upgrades, equipment combinations, and puzzle-solving included.

name: Over The Top: WWI
description: Over The Top: WWI brings brutal real-time third-person and first-person combat set in the First World War. Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal, including rifles, artillery, and even tanks, as you navigate the mud-soaked battlefields of the Great War.

name: Noah's Dilemma
description: Noah, the flood has come. Go search and collect animals that survived. Voyage across the sea to somewhere safe. Be careful though, don't let them kill each other. Noah's Dilemma is a unique Sudoku-inspired strategy roguelike set in a reimagined world of Noah's Ark.

name: Lost Inside: Act 1
description: Lost Inside is a non-traditional, character-focused, action-adventure RPG about a human child who stumbles their way into the Spirit World.

name: Deception of Doppelgangers
description: "Deception of Doppelgangers" is an intense 3-player cooperative dungeon crawler game. Explore the dungeon infested with doppelgangers, join forces with other adventurers, and escape the dungeon.

name: Re:Aegis
description: Re:AEGIS is a sci-fi roguelite survivors FPS where you take control of a combat android, generate powerful builds, and battle against the hordes of hostile tech in a combat simulation. Will you survive to see the end of the simulation?

name: Emin's Journey
description: Join Emin in a thrilling quest for lost happiness in this captivating pixel art adventure. A 2D platformer by a creative mind, it goes beyond conventions for an intense and memorable journey.

name: Placeless
description: Another place. Another drug epidemic. Another nightmare. Wake up in a drug-ridden slum and fight your way out, building by building. Old school Half Life meets Resident Evil 4 in this procedurally generated survival horror.

name: G.O.P.O.T.A 2
description: Don't you keep the kid's word?!

name: Culture Warz: Chess
description: Culture Warz Chess adds a layer of strategy and depth, while the meme-tastic visuals and over-the-top animations keep the tone light and playful.

name: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th
description: A remaster of the indie-tailored turn-based JRPG with roguelike elements set in a dark fantasy world, where your choices determine how challenging the fights and enemies will be.

name: The Girl's Moving Castle
description: he Girl's Moving Castle is an RPG focusing on companion collection and growth, strategic battles, and idle progression, with light interactions. It offers a no-grind, no-pay experience, with daily free rewards, ensuring an easy, premium game experience without spending.

name: Demons and Doobins
description: Sneak, Scirm, Doob.... all things you'll do in Demons and Doobins, the 2nd most fun game on Steam. Demons and Doobins is a multiplayer game meant for some stupid fun with friends.

name: Everything: All in 1
description: Everything: All in 1 offers you many different types of games in a single game package. Many different types of games such as action, platform, zombie, war, racing are waiting for you. Instead of paying for similar games one by one, you can buy all the games together at a very affordable price.

name: Paradigm Overhaul
description: An action puzzle game that makes full use of the power to break things and the power to heal. Explore a facility filled with dangers, try to escape from the facility, and solve the mysteries of the world.

name: Mills of Morris
description: Morris has long desired human life. He believes living as a human being is much better. Navigate through the Wizard’s puzzles and help him reach his goal in this pixel art sokoban, inspired by the classic Mills board game!

name: Hazard Pay
description: In this dark and mysterious block-pushing puzzler, you'll navigate through a secret, hazardous laboratory complex. Discover creative methods to destroy evidence and cover up the crimes of your employer.

name: Cult&Card
description: Card-based survival RTS. Mash cards together, build your cult, craft weapons, recruit followers and discover new rituals. Survive hordes of uncarded heretics and metaprogression.

name: Mozarella Hills
description: Embark on a Sisyphean adventure in Mozarella Hills, a retro-style 2D platformer rich in Greek mythology. Navigate through pixelated landscapes, solve ancient puzzles, and defy the whims of gods in a quest that blends classic arcade gameplay with a touch of epic storytelling.

name: Mops & Mobs: A Sweeping Dungeon Novel
description: As the dungeon's janitor, you take care of our monsters' well-being, pick up adventurers' left-over limbs, decorate the dungeon and find ways to let our beloved Dungeon Master look more competent.

name: Fading Skies
description: Explore a vivid fantasy world full of mystery, memorable characters, and heartfelt narrative. Unlock the powerful abilities of Ryn and her dragon companion, as you join her quest to stop the planet’s collapse. Only by confronting the shadows of her forgotten past can the future be saved.

name: RogueLive
description: Choose your heroes, watch them explore dungeons, and complete missions. In Roguelive, each hero has a unique personality that you need to consider when sending them on missions. Form a party with the warriors that suit your liking, watch how they explore the dungeons, and create your very own party.

name: Arcane Chaos
description: Immerse yourself in Arcane Chaos, the ultimate magic-fueled roguelike. Mastering chaotic spells to vanquish endless waves of foes. Level up, enhance your powers, and experiment with fusing spells to unlock a myriad of potent combinations. Can you navigate the relentless chaos and emerge victorious?

name: Kosmo Skirmish
description: Kosmo Skirmish is a multiplayer space combat game. Choose your appearance and your arsenal of 4 weapons and tools to destroy your opponents, alone or as part of a team. Up to 8 players online and/or local!

name: Andy Blast vs. The Forces of Evil
description: They wrecked your truck. They took your girl. They ruined date night. It's time for payback! Blast your way through 9 levels of platforming action with your trusty shotgun as you push through hordes of enemies to rescue Jeanette from the clutches of the Forces of Evil!

name: Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese Place
description: take the role of spider guy and escape the cheese place!

name: Orion Everton: Mysteries of Metrosomia
description: Prove that you are a smart detective. Determine the course of the story with interactive dialogues. Bring together the pieces of the case with a detective board based on multiple choices and decision-making. Solve the mystery behind the evidence you find. Interrogate people. Close the case.

name: Furry Backrooms
description: Furry Backrooms is a cooperative game for a group of 1-8 players that combines the best ideas from the BACKROOMS and FURRY universes. Single mode is also available. You have to survive and find a way out before the FURRY catches up with you. Updates and various interesting things await you...

name: Fusion Nexus: Alchemic Evolution
description: Embark on an alchemical journey in this vibrant 2D adventure! Craft unique monsters, engage in turn-based battles, and liberate the region. A fusion of exploration, crafting, and thrilling combat awaits in Fusion Nexus: Alchemic Evolution.

name: GeoSlider
description: Dive into our 3D puzzle game, where geography meets fun and learning! Solve time-limited puzzles that start easy and get trickier, offering an original and educational gaming experience. Explore the world in a whole new way!

name: Hexplorando
description: Discover the landscape and cultural heritage of Spain in this cozy 3D puzzle game where each region is a puzzle that brings art, territory, and history to life. Unlock heritage elements you can use in a limitless creative sandbox mode, with procedural quests to help you unleash your creativity.

name: Diorama Maker
description: Diorama Maker is an easy to use sandbox toy that lets you build dioramas in both VR and desktop. Choose from thousands of objects and create your own world.

name: I Know This Place..?: Chapter II
description: Chapter II of an extremely unusual project with game and short film chapters. Players influence the plot of the chapters and can leave their real-life items in the chapters. Ultra-deep meaning, nostalgic references, vibe mysticism.

name: Greenfeet Haven
description: Greenfeet Haven is a colony sim set in a fantasy world where you start from nothing into the wild. Cultivate the land, collect resources, craft valuable items and discover new technologies. Organize your village according to your desires, then watch your inhabitants lead their daily lives!

name: Gamebox
description: Gamebox is a free and open source sandbox game centered on user generated content. You decide what you want to play, be it in 3D or 2D, single-player or multiplayer, or create and upload your own games.

name: Prime
description: Prime is a strategic board game that combines elements of chess and checkers, with numbered pieces that move according to specific rules.

name: Pogo-Gogo
description: A game about pogoing up skyscrapers.
